item.title: Recruitment Data Round Up: What, When, Why And How
item.description:
Recruitment Data Round Up: What, When, Why And How

'Recruitment Data: What, When, Why And How', was the very last In-house Recruitment Network breakfast of 2015, and it was an absolute pleasure to share it with event partners, Broadbean Technology. The final breakfast event of the year united just over 30 in-house recruitment professionals, all of whom were keen for an education on the world of recruitment data and how to take advantage of it.

item.title: Logistics Manager Vacancy, Heswall, Wirral | Whitfield Business Hub
item.description:
Logistics Manager Vacancy, Heswall, Wirral | Whitfield Business Hub

Our customers expect to be wowed - at every interaction with us. Whether it's an email, a phone call or an engineer inspection, we give 110% to ensure extreme customer satisfaction. We don't do average. We're all about doing things smarter and more efficiently.

item.title: Best practice tips for keeping up-to-date on recruitment law
item.description:
Best practice tips for keeping up-to-date on recruitment law

Being knowledgeable about recruitment law is essential, whether you work on permanent, contract or temporary placements, and no matter which sector you work in. But how can you keep on top of all the changes? We sat down with Lewina Farrell, Head of Professional Services at the REC, to get her best practice tips for staying up-to-date on recruitment law.

item.title: Revenue and recruiter numbers up as industry has best year ever
item.description:
Revenue and recruiter numbers up as industry has best year ever

Total recruitment industry turnover increased by 9.7 per cent in 2014/15 to reach Â£31.5 billion. Growth was delivered by improved margins in the permanent market and increased volumes of temporary, contract and interim placements.
